name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.Cochain₀.one_apply
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
i : I
⊢ Eq (1 i) 1
decl:
@[simp, nolint simpNF]
lemma one_apply (i : I) : (1 : ZeroCochain G U) i = 1 := rfl

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.Cochain₀.inv_apply
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
γ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.ZeroCochain G U
i : I
⊢ Eq (Inv.inv γ i) (Inv.inv (γ i))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma inv_apply (γ : ZeroCochain G U) (i : I) : γ⁻¹ i = (γ i)⁻¹ := rfl

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.Cochain₀.mul_apply
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
γ₁ γ₂ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.ZeroCochain G U
i : I
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul γ₁ γ₂ i) (HMul.hMul (γ₁ i) (γ₂ i))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma mul_apply (γ₁ γ₂ : ZeroCochain G U) (i : I) : (γ₁ * γ₂) i = γ₁ i * γ₂ i := rfl

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain.ext_iff
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
x y : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain G U
⊢ Iff (Eq x y) (Eq x.ev y.ev)
decl:
/-- A 1-cochain of a presheaf of groups `G : Cᵒᵖ ⥤ Grp` on a family `U : I → C` of objects
consists of the data of an element in `G.obj (Opposite.op T)` whenever we have elements
`i` and `j` in `I` and maps `a : T ⟶ U i` and `b : T ⟶ U j`, and it must satisfy a compatibility
with respect to precomposition. (When the binary product of `U i` and `U j` exists, this
data for all `T`, `a` and `b` corresponds to the data of a section of `G` on this product.) -/
@[ext]
structure OneCochain where
  /-- the data involved in a 1-cochain -/
  ev (i j : I) ⦃T : C⦄ (a : T ⟶ U i) (b : T ⟶ U j) : G.obj (Opposite.op T)
  ev_precomp (i j : I) ⦃T T' : C⦄ (φ : T ⟶ T') (a : T' ⟶ U i) (b : T' ⟶ U j) :
    G.map φ.op (ev i j a b) = ev i j (φ ≫ a) (φ ≫ b) := by aesop

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain.mk.inj

x✝ : Eq { ev := ev✝, ev_precomp := ev_precomp✝ } { ev := ev, ev_precomp := ev_precomp }
⊢ Eq ev✝ ev
decl:

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain.one_ev
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
i j : I
T : C
a : Quiver.Hom T (U i)
b : Quiver.Hom T (U j)
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain.ev 1 i j a b) 1
decl:
@[simp]
lemma one_ev (i j : I) {T : C} (a : T ⟶ U i) (b : T ⟶ U j) :
    (1 : OneCochain G U).ev i j a b = 1 := rfl

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain.mul_ev
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
γ₁ γ₂ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain G U
i j : I
T : C
a : Quiver.Hom T (U i)
b : Quiver.Hom T (U j)
⊢ Eq ((HMul.hMul γ₁ γ₂).ev i j a b) (HMul.hMul (γ₁.ev i j a b) (γ₂.ev i j a b))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma mul_ev (γ₁ γ₂ : OneCochain G U) (i j : I) {T : C} (a : T ⟶ U i) (b : T ⟶ U j) :
    (γ₁ * γ₂).ev i j a b = γ₁.ev i j a b * γ₂.ev i j a b := rfl

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain.inv_ev
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C

U : I → C
γ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain G U
i j : I
T : C
a : Quiver.Hom T (U i)
b : Quiver.Hom T (U j)
⊢ Eq ((Inv.inv γ).ev i j a b) (Inv.inv (γ.ev i j a b))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma inv_ev (γ : OneCochain G U) (i j : I) {T : C} (a : T ⟶ U i) (b : T ⟶ U j) :
    (γ⁻¹).ev i j a b = (γ.ev i j a b)⁻¹ := rfl

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle.mk.injEq
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
toOneCochain✝ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain G U
ev_trans✝ : autoParam (∀ (i j k : I) ⦃T : C⦄ (a : Quiver.Hom T (U i)) (b : Quiver.Hom T (U j)) (c : Quiver.Hom T (U k)), Eq (HMul.hMul (toOneCochain✝.ev i j a b) (toOneCochain✝.ev j k b c)) (toOneCochain✝.ev i k a c)) _auto✝
toOneCochain : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain G U
ev_trans : autoParam (∀ (i j k : I) ⦃T : C⦄ (a : Quiver.Hom T (U i)) (b : Quiver.Hom T (U j)) (c : Quiver.Hom T (U k)), Eq (HMul.hMul (toOneCochain.ev i j a b) (toOneCochain.ev j k b c)) (toOneCochain.ev i k a c)) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (Eq { toOneCochain := toOneCochain✝, ev_trans := ev_trans✝ } { toOneCochain := toOneCochain, ev_trans := ev_trans }) (Eq toOneCochain✝ toOneCochain)
decl:
/-- A 1-cocycle is a 1-cochain which satisfies the cocycle condition. -/
structure OneCocycle extends OneCochain G U where
  ev_trans (i j k : I) ⦃T : C⦄ (a : T ⟶ U i) (b : T ⟶ U j) (c : T ⟶ U k) :
      ev i j a b * ev j k b c = ev i k a c := by aesop

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle.mk.inj

I : Type w'

toOneCochain✝ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain G U
ev_trans✝ : autoParam (∀ (i j k : I) ⦃T : C⦄ (a : Quiver.Hom T (U i)) (b : Quiver.Hom T (U j)) (c : Quiver.Hom T (U k)), Eq (HMul.hMul (toOneCochain✝.ev i j a b) (toOneCochain✝.ev j k b c)) (toOneCochain✝.ev i k a c)) _auto✝
toOneCochain : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain G U
ev_trans : autoParam (∀ (i j k : I) ⦃T : C⦄ (a : Quiver.Hom T (U i)) (b : Quiver.Hom T (U j)) (c : Quiver.Hom T (U k)), Eq (HMul.hMul (toOneCochain.ev i j a b) (toOneCochain.ev j k b c)) (toOneCochain.ev i k a c)) _auto✝
x✝ : Eq { toOneCochain := toOneCochain✝, ev_trans := ev_trans✝ } { toOneCochain := toOneCochain, ev_trans := ev_trans }
⊢ Eq toOneCochain✝ toOneCochain
decl:
/-- A 1-cocycle is a 1-cochain which satisfies the cocycle condition. -/
structure OneCocycle extends OneCochain G U where
  ev_trans (i j k : I) ⦃T : C⦄ (a : T ⟶ U i) (b : T ⟶ U j) (c : T ⟶ U k) :
      ev i j a b * ev j k b c = ev i k a c := by aesop

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle.mk.sizeOf_spec
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
inst✝¹ : SizeOf C
inst✝ : SizeOf I
toOneCochain : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain G U
ev_trans : autoParam (∀ (i j k : I) ⦃T : C⦄ (a : Quiver.Hom T (U i)) (b : Quiver.Hom T (U j)) (c : Quiver.Hom T (U k)), Eq (HMul.hMul (toOneCochain.ev i j a b) (toOneCochain.ev j k b c)) (toOneCochain.ev i k a c)) _auto✝
⊢ Eq (SizeOf.sizeOf { toOneCochain := toOneCochain, ev_trans := ev_trans }) (HAdd.hAdd 1 (SizeOf.sizeOf toOneCochain))
decl:
/-- A 1-cocycle is a 1-cochain which satisfies the cocycle condition. -/
structure OneCocycle extends OneCochain G U where
  ev_trans (i j k : I) ⦃T : C⦄ (a : T ⟶ U i) (b : T ⟶ U j) (c : T ⟶ U k) :
      ev i j a b * ev j k b c = ev i k a c := by aesop

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle.ev_trans
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
self : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle G U
i j k : I
T : C
a : Quiver.Hom T (U i)
b : Quiver.Hom T (U j)
c : Quiver.Hom T (U k)
⊢ Eq (HMul.hMul (self.ev i j a b) (self.ev j k b c)) (self.ev i k a c)
decl:
/-- A 1-cocycle is a 1-cochain which satisfies the cocycle condition. -/
structure OneCocycle extends OneCochain G U where
  ev_trans (i j k : I) ⦃T : C⦄ (a : T ⟶ U i) (b : T ⟶ U j) (c : T ⟶ U k) :
      ev i j a b * ev j k b c = ev i k a c := by aesop

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle.one_toOneCochain
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle.toOneCochain 1) 1
decl:
@[simp]
lemma one_toOneCochain : (1 : OneCocycle G U).toOneCochain = 1 := rfl

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle.ev_refl
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
γ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle G U
i : I
T : C
a : Quiver.Hom T (U i)
⊢ Eq (γ.ev i i a a) 1
decl:
@[simp]
lemma ev_refl (γ : OneCocycle G U) (i : I) ⦃T : C⦄ (a : T ⟶ U i) :
    γ.ev i i a a = 1 := by
  simpa using γ.ev_trans i i i a a a

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle.ev_symm
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
γ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle G U
i j : I
T : C
a : Quiver.Hom T (U i)
b : Quiver.Hom T (U j)
⊢ Eq (γ.ev i j a b) (Inv.inv (γ.ev j i b a))
decl:
lemma ev_symm (γ : OneCocycle G U) (i j : I) ⦃T : C⦄ (a : T ⟶ U i) (b : T ⟶ U j) :
    γ.ev i j a b = (γ.ev j i b a)⁻¹ := by
  rw [← mul_left_inj (γ.ev j i b a), γ.ev_trans i j i a b a,
    ev_refl, inv_mul_cancel]

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCohomologyRelation.refl
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
γ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain G U
⊢ CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCohomologyRelation γ γ 1
decl: lemma refl (γ : OneCochain G U) : OneCohomologyRelation γ γ 1 := fun _ _ _ _ _ ↦ by simp

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCohomologyRelation.symm
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
γ₁ γ₂ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain G U
α : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.ZeroCochain G U
h : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCohomologyRelation γ₁ γ₂ α
⊢ CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCohomologyRelation γ₂ γ₁ (Inv.inv α)
decl:
lemma symm {γ₁ γ₂ : OneCochain G U} {α : ZeroCochain G U} (h : OneCohomologyRelation γ₁ γ₂ α) :
    OneCohomologyRelation γ₂ γ₁ α⁻¹ := fun i j T a b ↦ by
  rw [← mul_left_inj (G.map b.op (α j)), mul_assoc, ← h i j a b,
    mul_assoc, Cochain₀.inv_apply, map_inv, inv_mul_cancel_left,
    Cochain₀.inv_apply, map_inv, inv_mul_cancel, mul_one]

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCohomologyRelation.trans
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
γ₁ γ₂ γ₃ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCochain G U
α β : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.ZeroCochain G U
h₁₂ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCohomologyRelation γ₁ γ₂ α
h₂₃ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCohomologyRelation γ₂ γ₃ β
⊢ CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCohomologyRelation γ₁ γ₃ (HMul.hMul β α)
decl:
lemma trans {γ₁ γ₂ γ₃ : OneCochain G U} {α β : ZeroCochain G U}
    (h₁₂ : OneCohomologyRelation γ₁ γ₂ α) (h₂₃ : OneCohomologyRelation γ₂ γ₃ β) :
    OneCohomologyRelation γ₁ γ₃ (β * α) := fun i j T a b ↦ by
  dsimp
  rw [map_mul, map_mul, mul_assoc, h₁₂ i j a b, ← mul_assoc,
    h₂₃ i j a b, mul_assoc]

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle.equivalence_isCohomologous
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
⊢ Equivalence CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle.IsCohomologous
decl:
lemma equivalence_isCohomologous :
    _root_.Equivalence (IsCohomologous (G := G) (U := U)) where
  refl γ := ⟨_, OneCohomologyRelation.refl γ.toOneCochain⟩
  symm := by
    rintro γ₁ γ₂ ⟨α, h⟩
    exact ⟨_, h.symm⟩
  trans := by
    rintro γ₁ γ₂ γ₂ ⟨α, h⟩ ⟨β, h'⟩
    exact ⟨_, h.trans h'⟩

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle.class_eq_iff
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
γ₁ γ₂ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle G U
⊢ Iff (Eq γ₁.class γ₂.class) (γ₁.IsCohomologous γ₂)
decl:
lemma OneCocycle.class_eq_iff (γ₁ γ₂ : OneCocycle G U) :
    γ₁.class = γ₂.class ↔ γ₁.IsCohomologous γ₂ :=
  (equivalence_isCohomologous _ _ ).quot_mk_eq_iff _ _

name: CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle.IsCohomologous.class_eq
initialProofState:
C : Type u
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v, u} C
G : CategoryTheory.Functor (Opposite C) Grp
I : Type w'
U : I → C
γ₁ γ₂ : CategoryTheory.PresheafOfGroups.OneCocycle G U
h : γ₁.IsCohomologous γ₂
⊢ Eq γ₁.class γ₂.class
decl:
lemma OneCocycle.IsCohomologous.class_eq {γ₁ γ₂ : OneCocycle G U} (h : γ₁.IsCohomologous γ₂) :
    γ₁.class = γ₂.class :=
  Quot.sound h
